in Savage Worlds- when you roll a skill check - like a Seduction roll- if you roll Max- you roll again and add it to the total
Cool, but while I’d like the ability to fly, me and heights don’t hang
Hahaha wow, what a crit system
So...the birdman got 5 max rolls in a row?

in fact- one way to kinda cheat the system a bit is to leave your skill at the second lowest it can go - a d4 because you have a 1/4 chance of getting max and rolling again- and then another 1/4 chance
Sounds like SOMEone wanted to stop your seductive rampage
in Savage worlds we roll in the open for stuff like that
just like how one of our guys ruined a boss fight by rolling a 59 on his attack on a creature in the dark
honestly, it sounds to me like someone actually knows how to roll a dice to make it land on a specific side
The evil spider like horror cackled and with his laughter the light faded and smoke poured into the room- the doofus threw a dagger for 59
Does the higher number do more damage too?
nah but we do use a "Incredible hit" rule for when that stuff happens
and there is no such thing as rolling a dice so it lands how you want so long as you are rolling properly
critical hits are 4 over the threashold
Whereas this is like. 50 over the threshold
something that is like 3 times the threshold are "Incredible hits"
its like throwing a dagger at an enemy and it just manages to go in the eye slit of the guys armor and hits hard enough to drive through the eye and into the brain-
It sounds like borderlands the rpg

it's not even algebra though, kiwi

giant snake picked me up - started crushing me - i almost died right there- i managed to slip out barely
and the GM was like "Ok, your turn - what do you do?" "I run" and everyone looks at me
and im like "In this world people hate Elves- I dont like any of you, you've all been dicks, I dont care if the town dies- they are all filthy humans! I RUN!"
and I ran. I ran so far away
and sure enough- they all died- and they realized "Wow- that elf is really fast!"
And we all learnt a valuable lesson
they were like "I had no idea he could run that fast" and the GM was like "Well- he is an Elf, and his class is a Scout built"
this was a Dragon Age system
man ive played in a lot of different game systems
the worse was Star Wars Fantasy Flight Games system

still confused how our AC thinks it's 81 when it's only 75
far as I know, it's inside the thermostat
find out where- because it might be next to an element heating up or shorting out
tis what 4 or 5 ppl have said, after we've been fighting this damn thing since moving here in.. may.. june.
well, we've had at least 3 different repairmen come out and say it's "working fine" when it hasn't held the correct temp since we've been here.. and it's apparently supposedly new
you let repairmen get away with telling you something is fine when it clearly isnt?
you know what would happen if I did that? I would be trying to run a high speed lan in my house over a single copper wire
for those who dont know - It takes 8 copper wires for a LAN connection
the electrician insisted he ran the cable right and i said "Then why are there single copper cable wires hanging out- where theyre should be a whole cat6 cable?"
Well I'm not really the one that's "in charge" of taking care of electrician shit
yeah well my father looked at me - hes been working with computers since they used punch cards, and asked me "Wait- is that true? Can we just use one copper cable?"
and the Electrician got a smug look on his face and i said "NO, only an idiot would think an 8 pin Ethernet cable could run on ONE copper wire."

and my father looked back at him and said "Well how many of these have you run?" and he was like "We run this stuff all the time" and I was like "You run it for Phones dont you? You use Cat6, split it and run the pairs out for telephone land lines"
My dad asked - "How many have you ran for Ethernet internet?" and he was like "People use phone lines for Internet"
Even phones need 2 wires, not one
and I was like "15 years ago maybe! Run a cat6 cable- the whole thing- from here- to there- then another from here to there - and then one more!"
the wires in the cat6 are twisted pairs
Permission to intersect abrupt subject change?

the electrician said "Well im sure this would work fine." and i was furious at this point and said "You want to bet on that? You cant even attach the fitting on the end of it with 2 cables! I have them in my car right now if you want to find out but -
You'll be wasting my time and yours!"
so he ran the cables but he was still a dick because he used the old split cable for one of them- which is how the lightning strike killed my adapter and 2 network cards on Mobos in the house
theres an unshielded line in the wall
that's it for the story of the retarded electrician and how even now 3 years later he screwed us
Have you got a better one?
i got surge protectors on all the network lines now and we are going to replace the lines with Cat7 once it gets cooler
